answers.answer: IOM Romania offers free consultations with a family doctor, psychologist, and gynecologist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Free medical care from IOM Romania is available to Ukrainians and refugees from other countries.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Refugees can access free medical care at RomExpo, located at Meresti Boulevard 65-67, Bucharest 011465, which serves as the center of assistance for refugees from Ukraine.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: To schedule an appointment with a doctor, individuals must first make an appointment with IOM representatives at their office located in RomExpo.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The working hours for the IOM Romania free medical care center are Monday through Friday, from 9:00 to 17:00.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Contact information includes RomExpo's address (Meresti Boulevard 65-67, Bucharest 011465) and phone number (0212077000), an IOM phone number (+40 21 â€“ 210.30.50), and the IOM website (https://romania.iom.int/).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: IOM Romania ensures language accessibility by having all doctors who are English speakers, and by offering free translation services upon request.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Refugees can expect free consultations from a family doctor, a psychologist, and a gynecologist.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care-for-refugees-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.
